description: This file implements the basic container object functions for the Broadway Web Resource Manager's Page Manager Object, including creation, removal, enrollment of contained objects, and initialization. It defines functions for object lifecycle management and internal setup, including timers and internal properties.

classes.name: BWRM_PAGE_MANAGER_OBJECT
classes.description: Main object representing the Page Manager, including properties for timers, cache settings, and object lifecycle methods.

classes.name: ANSC_COMPONENT_OBJECT
classes.description: Base structure for component objects, includes common attributes for all such objects.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE BwrmPmoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Bwrm Page Manager Object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwrmPmoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Page Manager Object and releases resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwrmPmoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrols internal timer and other necessary objects into the Page Manager.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BwrmPmoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes member variables and sets up the object properties.
